entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Should Host resolve keyed hosted services? #99085
  • DI resolve parameter using same ServiceKey #99084
  • Profiles of Single File Exes Cannot Resolve R2R Symbols #99082
  • [NativeAOT] System.Runtime.Tests occasionally crashes on linux-arm-NativeAOT #99079
  • CI test failure: Connection handshake was canceled due to the configured timeout #99074
  • SslProtocols.Tls13: TLS Handshake Header Lists TLS 1.0 #99071
  • [mono] Cleanup: generic parameter attribute duplicate enum definitions #99057
    Future
  • ilc compilation failure: Invalid IL or CLR metadata #99047
  • Incorrect value returned by `Environment.ProcessorCount` when running on GCP Cloud Run resulting in memory problems. #99046
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `ArgumentException.ThrowIf` method #99035
  • Blazor WASM: "[MONO] * Assertion at ..., condition `<disabled>' not met" (AGAIN) #99030
  • Provide a `hostfxr` API for resolving runtime frameworks #99027
    9.0.0

Closed

  • [wasm] Jiterpreter implementation of CALL_HANDLER is incorrect #98577
  • Double Array members with Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Get and Records #99080
  • Test failure: Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_45929/test45929/test45929.cmd #98914
  • profiler\\multiple\\multiple\\multiple.cmd failing on windows arm64 #98817
    9.0.0
  • XmlBaseWriter async operations #95586
  • [PERF] Mono AOT BDN runs failing to build "Unable to compile method" #98967
  • Json serialize, deserialize (dont try to be smart) #99060
  • System.Text.Json: returning JsonElement[] from WebApi Controller results in huge memory consumption #97157
  • System.Text.Json source generator does not handle reserved words as field names #99054
  • This is technically a breaking change, although the use case doesn't seem particularly common. If the goal is to convert a byte into a byte array, this can be trivially done with `new byte[] { (byte)value }`. #99052
  • [browser][wbt] RunWithDifferentAppBundleLocations #98828
    9.0.0
  • [mono][tvos] OOM in System.IO.Tests.MemoryStreamTests #92467
    9.0.0
  • QuicConnection: Validate certificates asynchronously. #98039
    9.0.0
  • RyuJIT: Index Variable Widening optimization for array accesses #7312
    9.0.0
  • [WASM] dynamically compiled method with infinite loop renders the runtime non-functional #98855
    9.0.0
  • Unknown reloc type 264 and some decode failures on linux-arm64 nativeaot collection #98996
  • MetricsEventSource formats histogram quantiles with CurrentCulture, causing dotnet-counters to misparse them #98632
  • BitArray.CopyTo(Array, int) throws an ArgumentException, if BitArray.Length has been reduced to a multiple of 32 #98813
    Future
  • [browser][WBT] DownloadResourceProgressTests.DownloadProgressFinishes #98486
    9.0.0
  • Enumerable.TryGetNonEnumeratedCount(): Add support for IReadOnlyCollection<T> [Existing API Enhancement Proposal]: #99028
  • Test failure: profiler\\multiple\\multiple\\multiple.cmd #98787
    9.0.0
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.2.24113.6] SharpScss.dll causes application crash when converting scss to css #98646
  • NativeAOT Convert C# Struct to C++ Pointer Failed #98922
  • Test failure: GC\\Features\\KeepAlive\\keepaliveother\\keepalivetry\\keepalivetry.cmd #98916
  • Test failure: JIT/Directed/ExcepFilters/mixed3/mixed3/mixed3.dll #98917
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/CLR-x86-JIT/V1-M12-Beta2/b58360/b58360/b58360.dll #98918

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_BX_2A` and `SVE_BY_2A` #99087
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Suppress instances of cs/leap-year/unsafe-date-construction-from-two-elements #99086
    area-System.DateTime
  • Fix regression in jiterpreter trace generation #99083
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono] Add basic ref struct support for generic parameter #99081
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Disable STJ SG unit tests on x86 hardware. #99078
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Update CI Know issue template to point to helper page and update docs #99077
    area-Infrastructure
  • Throw exception when we see timeout in Profiler test #99075
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Set the exact initial capacity of a List literal #99073
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, Future
  • Copy the NativeAOT AllocateTypeAssociatedMemory to Mono #99072
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • Remove call to InflateInterfaces that does nothing #99070
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add PerfViper queues and update PerfSurf queues #99068
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add GJ_3A to AV_3A, BB_2A and BC_1A #99062
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Special case Mono in SpanHelpers.Fill/CleanWithoutReference #99059
    area-System.Memory
  • Add ARM64 encodings for groups IF_SVE_HO,HP,HS #99058
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Add some missing opcodes for cfold #99055
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Memoize some CngKey standard properties #99053
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add some metrics for widening IVs #99051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: Implement IF_SVE_BV_2A #99049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT: Generalize strategy for finding addrecs #99048
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix FormatQuantiles formatting in MetricsEventSource #99045
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Test on CI #99042
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Build-mono
  • Handle MakeGeneric APIs in dataflow #99037
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • FabricBot: Onboarding to GitOps.ResourceManagement because of FabricBot decommissioning #99034
    area-Meta
  • Strip unused generic type context for VASigCookie #99026
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [Test Only] Ignore, just to run some tests. #99025
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label

Merged

  • Add info in docs about diagnosing Build Analysis failures #98778
    area-Meta
  • Do not compare Span<T> with null #98958
    area-Meta
  • Enable QueueUserAPC2 suspension even without CET #99076
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Exclude failing test on Musl-based Linux #99031
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable the new exception handling by default again #99066
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix unwound stack range check for the new EH #99041
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Disable source gen unit tests on mono. #98994
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Handle ERROR_NOT_SUPPORTED from QueueUserAPC2 #99033
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Consolidate LINQ's internal IIListProvider/IPartition into base Iterator class #98969
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • Remove Sam from Mono files ownership #99069
    area-Meta
  • Build special win-x86 JIT with funclets for NativeAOT #98924
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-preview2] Disable the new exception handling by default again #99067
    Servicing-approved, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix TryParseBigIntegerHexOrBinaryNumberStyle #97995
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Disable terminal logger when running from root build script #99036
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update lead ownership from Arthur to Sam #99050
    area-Meta
  • Don't call user callbacks on MsQuic worker thread. #98361
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [mono][interp] Disable optimization in weird scenario of infinite loop #99032
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix FormatQuantiles formatting in MetricsEventSource #98699
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • Fix BitArray.CopyTo #98846
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Update SDK to preview 1 release #98476
    area-Infrastructure
  • Console.Unix: Fix use of terminfo for get window size cache #98912
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Add missing jumpTable increment #98992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Update linux musl arm32 helix image to Alpine 3.17 #98531
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Optimize the overflow check for `GT_ADD` and `GT_SUB` in emitter::emitInsTernary(). #98742
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [browser][wbt] Fix not failing download for `DownloadProgressFinishes` test when randomly picked index is zero #98985
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Increase timeout in profiler multiple test #99014
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add back OverridePackageId for the crossgen sfxproj #99005
    area-Setup
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add AB_3B to EI_3A #99017
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Disable QUIC tests on alpine arm32 #99020
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT: Use successor edges instead of block targets for remaining block kinds #98993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable failing outerloop regex test #98965
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

Updated

  • [ILLink analyzer] Add analyzer support for feature checks #94944
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [ILLink] Add interface implementing type to OverrideInformation and use where it makes sense #98274
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Remove ref struct pinning from locals #97997
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: start checking sum of successor likelihoods #99024
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Read/Write Async test #98432
    area-System.Threading
  • Expanded & clarified BerConverter tests #98676
    area-System.DirectoryServices, test-enhancement
  • Preserve all InternalsVisibleTo attributes in ILLink Trimmer #98910
    community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use new MacOS arm64 pool for official builds #98117
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add overview of runtime logging to the Book of the Runtime #98881
    documentation, area-Meta, runtime-coreclr
  • Fix conflicting TADDR definition #98925
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable riscv64 R2R in installer #96941
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Build Mac symbols in .dSYM bundle, not single .dwarf file #96456
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Make FailFast a QCall #98908
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement more ServicePoint properties #97537
    area-System.Net
  • Increase tolerances for floating point types in TP tests. #99023
    area-System.Numerics, 9.0.0
  • [NO REVIEW] correctness test for a perf improvement #98838
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Reapply revert of https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/pull/97227, fix Lock's waiter duration computation #98876
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Fix missing relocations in NativeAOT x86 output #98740
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix asserts and GC holes with `Unsafe.Subtract/ByteOffset` #99019
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add ARM64 encodings for groups IF_SVE_CE,CF #98409
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Add ARM64 encodings for group IF_SVE_BH_3A,3B,3B_A #98764
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Expose TLS details for QUIC connection #93014
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Debug RunWithDifferentAppBundleLocations times out #98981
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Disable IPV6 cases of QuicConnectionTests.TestConnect on non-ipv6 systems #98999
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [mono] Test upgrading to ICU 73.2 #95610
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono
  • [RISC-V] R2RDump to handle System.Private.CoreLib #98849
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • [browser][MT] Add new test for multi-threading SignalR in Blazor WBT #98343
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Rewrite DbBuffer Read/Write methods with stackalloc #88395
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Convert small atomic fallbacks to managed #99011
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Implement Swift's physical lowering pass for NativeAOT #98831
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Make sure we compact the LOH when aggressive GC is requested #98954
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Replace unaligned casts in SpanHelpers.Memmove #98812
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • CoreCLR NativeAOT - ByRef generics and ByRef implementing interfaces #98070
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Improve alternation switch optimization in regex source generator #98723
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 9.0.0
  • Ensure `Array.Resize` creates an array of the same type as the incoming array #99021
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Publish postprocessing logic doesn't account for conflicts #39107
  • Cannot install globally a .NET tool on Linux when the version contains uppercase #39105
  • Running xunit tests from console using .NET 9 Preview 1 SDK elides important informantion #39103
  • QUIC Is Still Marked As A Preview Feature #39074

Closed

  • [Bug]: getItem/getProperty output can contain unrelated junk #36694
    9.0.1xx
  • dotnet --getProperty can sometime return more than one value #38944

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove the System.Drawing.Common dependency #39108
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Disable compiler toolset in sdk #39086
  • Don't run PackageInstall test targets when the project is excluded #39079
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Cherry-pick #38956 to release/8.0.3xx #39070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Move dotnet/format to dotnet/sdk #38857
    untriaged
  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add Install Records for VS Managed Workloads During 'Update' #38346
    Area-Workloads
  • Use MSBuild CLI in the test framework to get Property/Item data #38811
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38989
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Discussion: Prototype for `dotnet tool update --all` #38996
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Include CodeStyle targets files even when not enforcing code style in build #38968
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-28
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: IsNullableAttribute to flow nullability of generic type parameters into methods #7975

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Static abstract members in interfaces #4436
    11.0
  • [Proposal]: Field and value as contextual keywords #7964
  • Proposal: Semi-Auto-Properties; `field` keyword #140
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Dictionary expressions #7822

PullRequests

Created

  • Add syntax grammar for `allows` constraint to ref-struct-interfaces.md #7977

Updated

  • Determine element type for write-only CollectionBuilder collection types #7895
  • Add details to lookup rules for for extensions #7179

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • List SetCount/AsSpan optimization should produce a list with same capacity as List made with new/Add #72318
  • Suspicious logic in `TypeSymbolExtensions.IsValidEnumType` #72317
  • Suspicious logic in `AbstractFlowPass.IsNonPrimitiveValueType` #72316
  • Getting ghost lightbulbs lately #72310
  • `SyntaxFacts`' method can make assumptions aboun nonexistent syntax kinds #72301
  • `SyntaxFacts`'s `GetXXXKinds` methods can return nonexistent syntax kinds #72300

Closed

  • "Use recursive patterns" suggests redundant "this is { ... }" pattern #64111
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Directory.Build.props to reduce signtool parallelism #72319
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove legacy incremental-analyzer implementation of TaskList. #72315
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Small optimization around ProjectState modification operations #72313
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make sure to meld string or char constants in expression in interpolated string into adjacent literal & Use `String.Concat` if possible in interpolated string in VB #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update area path #72306
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • FabricBot: Onboarding to GitOps.ResourceManagement because of FabricBot decommissioning #72305
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove UsingToolNetFrameworkReferenceAssemblies #72304
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable CodeQL in unofficial builds #72302
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • More PRs for 17.10P2 snap #72299
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Address some PROTOTYPE comments #72298
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections

Merged

  • Avoid synthesizing the parameterless struct constructor unnecessarily #72314
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove redundant null check when using recursive patterns refactor #72185
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Update .git-blame-ignore-revs #72311
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72292
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update code to be more consistent. #72294
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Feedback on deferring compilation creations. #72295
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Defer creating compilations for in-progress-states until actually needed. #72289
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Updated

  • Incorporate underlying type's hierarchy into overload resolution #72155
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Implement module cancellation and stack probing instrumentations #71896
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Convert Clasp into a source package #72237
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Patterns: Allow non-negative and full integer sets to merge (intersect or union) #71968
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add support for AIOSP to search only the current document or current project. #72293
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement GetInterceptorMethod public API #72279
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce byte[] allocations when opening files #72214
  • WIP: Defer array creation in ConcurrentCache. #72291
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in lexer #72243
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle OperatorDeclaration when adding a member #72276
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Handle ref safety of user-defined operators #71911
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Move all the MSBuildWorkspace projects under a single folder #72226
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • WIP: Remove solution crawler #72147
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix 'convert to file scoped namespace' and interpolated raw strings #72297
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Reduce allocations under RemoteAssetProvider.SynchronizeAssetsAsync #72229
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fixed List pattern is not correctly formatted in the first arm of a switch expression #72269
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when comparing signatures #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • GetRelative paths accepts paths shorter than the base directory #72166
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Do not return unexisting kinds in `SyntaxFacts`' methods #72264
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Include SourceLink file in CoreCompile dependency checks #72109
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Bump roslyn-sdk and System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #72242
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.VisualDiagnostics #72296
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Support for features in Copilot Chat #72097
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Component (using RenderMode Interactive Server) - Incorrect Behavior on Navigating between pages, Component is not re-created #54263
  • Perf regression: caching, fortunes_dapper #54262
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #54261
  • Html Renderer doesn't add the commented lines so the outlook specific codes. #54260
  • Error when upgrading Azure.Extensions.AspNetCore.DataProtection.Keys #54253
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Perf regression: json #54252
  • System.InvalidOperationException: NativeOverlapped cannot be reused for multiple operations after .NET 6 to .NET 8 upgrade #54251

Closed

  • Regression, Blazor WASM OIDC login callback to not sent to the requested page when published #51870
    8.0.x
  • QuickGrid API docs missing #52466
    8.0.x
  • Blazor Stream Rendering not working on IIS Express #52323
    8.0.x
  • Expose underlying connection when leveraging Kestrel for IPC #54053
  • [NETSDKE2E]The hyperlink "https://aka.ms/aspnetcore/9.0-third-party-notices" could not be redirected to the correct page. #54254
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext, plaintext #54183

PullRequests

Created

  • Move computation of ShouldGenerateNewKey to KeyRingProvider #54264
    area-dataprotection
  • Remove UsingToolNetFrameworkReferenceAssemblies #54258
    area-infrastructure
  • Fallback to `IActivator.CreateInstance<IXmlDecryptor>` when `Type.GetType` fails #54256
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution
  • Update docs for KestrelServerLimits #54255
    community-contribution, area-networking

Merged

  • Disable buffering of Blazor streaming responses #53929
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview3

Updated

  • Use constant values for CorsPolicy.cs and CorsPolicyBuilder.cs #54247
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Preserve RemoteAuthenticationContext during JS interop #54225
    area-blazor
  • Fix DefaultProblemDetailsWriter doesn't handle media type subsets #54158
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Caching: SE.Redis update and fix naming inconsistency #54239
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-28
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Update resourceManagement to include event responder flows #4531

Merged

  • Add some diag info options to host commands #4528
  • Remove UsingToolNetFrameworkReferenceAssemblies #4534

Updated

  • Test against net9.0 #4529

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Android Notch Calculation similar to iOS SafeArea (DisplayCutout API) #20906
  • DatePicker and TimePicker Text color property is not working MacOS #20904
  • [Windows] Registering new double-tap event can end up in the event firing multiple times #20903
  • [Enhancement] Add more descriptive exception for route not found (Shell.Current.GoToAsync). #20902
  • Crash when using FileProvider on Android in Release Mode: "Couldn't find meta-data for provider with authority" #20898
  • Improve EventTrigger #20897
  • Mac Idiom (Device family = 6) Button styling properties not working #20896
  • WebView inside of a datatemplate #20895
  • [testing] Reenable TopTabsDontScrollBackToStartWhenSelected #20892
    Backlog
  • FlexLayout doesn't scroll. | MAUI.NET USING .NET 8 #20890
  • Embeded youtube video doesn't work on iOS (MAUI Blazor Hybrid .NET7, .NET8) #20887
  • multiple Grid DropGestureRecognizers under Android will receive the message! #20886
  • MenuFlyoutItem Commands are not executed when MenuFlyout is in a ContentView #20884
  • Issue with bindings in ListView #20883

Closed

  • `CodeBehindGenerator` has improper pipeline #12978
    Backlog
  • We should set the FontSize with correct TextAttribute name. #17314
  • Unable to scroll carouselview inside of a tabbed page #18490
    Backlog
  • Shell.NavBarHasShadow not working correctly on Android #19458
    Backlog
  • [iOS] NullReferenceException in TemplatedCell #20606
    .NET 8 SR3
  • Android - Setting only SelectedTabColor on TabbedPage causes System.NullReferenceException #19299
    .NET 8 SR3
  • [Potential Regression] Connectivity.ConnectivityChanged app crash #20690
    .NET 8 SR3
  • SearchBar is not currently being Garbage Collected #20024
    .NET 8 SR3
  • Maui Hybrid: build fails when adding json file to ./Resources/Raw #17078
  • ProgressColor does not work on Mac Catalyst with the macOS UI Idiom #20876
  • Non-negative number required. (Parameter 'width') #20882

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Registering new double-tap event can end up in the event being firing more times than expected #20905
    community ✨
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview2] Update aotprofile #20901
  • FabricBot: Onboarding to GitOps.ResourceManagement because of FabricBot decommissioning #20894
  • Update Maps Project API Docs #20893
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/Maps🗺

Merged

  • [XamlC] Fix error XDataTypeSyntax message format #20787
    area/Xaml </>
  • Graphics TextAttribute wrongly uses FontName value for FontSize #20861
    area/fonts 🅰️
  • Fixed Shell.NavBarHasShadow on Android #20188
    platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢, community ✨

Updated

  • [ci] Enable 1ES PT #20728

  • Document ICanvas #20881
    area/docs 📓
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #20460
  • [WIP] Testing timeouts for iOS device tests #20843
    do-not-merge

  • IndicatorView IndicatorTemplate Binding #19004

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SQL Server EnsureCreated/EnsureDeleted using SqlCredential to provide credentials #33192
  • SqlError number 4060 (user login failed as default database doesn't exist) shouldn't retry #33191
  • Increment DateTimeOffset with value converter #33190
  • Use testcontainer for testing Cosmos DB #33189
  • Migration keeps trying to add/delete a discriminator even though i specified e.HasBaseType((Type)null) #33188
  • Unable to create a 'DbContext' of Type "". In .Net 8 with EF Core 8 #33187
  • Complex property causes "The multi-part identifier "xxx" could not be bound" after GroupBy + Select(x => x.First()) #33183

Closed

  • wrong records in result set #33179
  • Unable to retrieve entities from InMemoryDatabase when entity type has a generic complex type property #33172
  • Data type Decimal(n,0) causes an exception in SQL server by create and update #33139
  • Long Compilation Time and Large Designer Files in EF Core 7 Project #33137
  • Adjust DB context generation from DB #33131
  • Unable to include in depth #33123
  • Conversion overflow exception on insert or update a decimal value with DECIMAL(38,10) #33109
  • Entityframeworkcore 8 is not backward compatible with Entityframeworkcore 5.0.17, getting compile time error #33104
  • ProxyFactory should be extendible to allow other interfaces to be proxied #33080
  • Thoughts or ideas around high perf scenarios with EF #33070
  • Performance implications of Projections which result in unnecessary casts #33036
  • Navigation properties not loading properly #32991
  • The error that Sequence contains no matching element occasionally happens when application just start #32985
  • Bug or Ignorance? SelectMany with Distinct and Sum #32903
  • Sugar for HierarchyId path generation #32943
    9.0.0
  • EF Core power tool is not generating mappings for a table with foreign keys in it from other tables #33186
  • Concurrency issues of different transactions in the same context #32474

PullRequests

Merged

  • Cleanup duplicate tests (same test ID) #33185
    community-contribution
  • 32943-Sugar for HierarchyId path generation #33062
    community-contribution

Updated

  • Discover the compiled model automatically #33148

entry.content:
